questions.question_text:
A company uses Dynamics 365 Finance and Power BI.

The company wants to use Power BI to create high-volume, near real-time reports.

You need to identify how the company can meet this requirement.

Which option should you use?

discussion.content:
Selected Answer: D
"Customers can use Microsoft Power BI DirectQuery models together with Entity store to enable high-volume, near-real-time analytical reporting over large volumes of data." https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/dynamics365/fin-ops-core/dev-itpro/analytics/power-bi-integration-entity-store

questions.question_text:
HOTSPOT
-

A company uses Dynamics 365 Supply Chain Management. The company plans to implement asset bill of materials (BOMs) to manage spare parts.

Instructions: For each of the following statements, select Yes if the statement is true. Otherwise, select No.

NOTE: Each correct selection is worth one point.

//IMG//

discussion.content: Should the last question not be false (no)? Should this not be item model group instead og item group?
I think it should be No - No - No

Also, this question is similar to Question 1. In Question 1, the answer for the create-a-prototype question (third question) is "engineer-to-order", yet here the first question, related to prototypes, states that the answer is configure-to-order?

questions.question_text:
HOTSPOT
-

For each of the following statements, select Yes if the statement is true. Otherwise, select No.

NOTE: Each correct selection is worth one point.

//IMG//

DRAG DROP
-

A company plans to use Dynamics 365 Supply Chain Management.

Match each inventory management function/technique to its use case.

To answer, drag the appropriate inventory management function/technique from the column on the left to its use case on the right. Each inventory management function/technique may be used once, more than once, or not at all.

NOTE: Each correct match is worth one point.

//IMG//
